description: This file defines a singleton provider class 'OrchestratorProvider' that manages a shared instance of 'GenerationOrchestrator'. It provides UI-agnostic access to the orchestrator with lifecycle management including disposal.

classes.name: OrchestratorProvider
classes.description: A singleton class that provides access to a shared 'GenerationOrchestrator' instance, avoiding tight coupling with the UI layer and managing its lifecycle.

methods.name: orchestrator
methods.description: Getter that returns the shared 'GenerationOrchestrator' instance, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the current orchestrator and resets the internal reference.
